# *   "Apply Prettier formatting to all Angular project files (`*.ts`, `*.html`, `*.scss`, `*.md`) using the workspace-level configuration."
* "Fix inconsistent indentation, spacing, HTML formatting, SCSS formatting, and semicolon usage according to Angular-compatible Prettier rules."
*   **"Add a `.prettierrc` configuration optimized for Angular projects, enforcing:**
    *   Trailing commas (`"all"`)
    *   100-character line width
    *   Single quotes
    *   Proper formatting for TypeScript, HTML templates, and SCSS"**
*   **"Show how to configure Prettier together with the official `@angular-eslint` setup, including support for Angular template formatting (`*.html`) and TypeScript files."**
*   **"Integrate Prettier with Angular ESLint using:**
    *   `"eslint-config-prettier"`
    *   `"eslint-plugin-prettier"`
    *   VS Code settings for Format on Save
    *   Workspace recommendations for extensions (`esbenp.prettier-vscode`)
*   Format this Angular file strictly using the configured Prettier rules without modifying any logic, decorators, Angular metadata, DI structure, or change detection behavior."
